name: app.R
content:
#
# This is a Shiny web application. You can run the application by clicking
# the 'Run App' button above.
#
# Find out more about building applications with Shiny here:
#
#    https://shiny.posit.co/
#
source("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clazinusveijer/shinylive_BIA/refs/heads/main/run_simulation.R")

if (!require('pacman')) install.packages('pacman'); library(pacman) 
#p_load_gh("DARTH-git/darthtools") 
p_load("devtools", "dplyr", "scales", "ellipse", "ggplot2", "lazyeval", "igraph", "truncnorm", "ggraph", "reshape2", "stringr", "dampack", "matrixStats")

library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
  
  # Application title
  titlePanel("BIA"),
  
  sidebarPanel(
    numericInput("input_c_trt", "Enter average treatment costs per day (EUR):", value = 0),
    sliderInput("modifier_mild_moderate", "Set the reduction in disease progression from mild to moderate ARDS for the treatment population:", min = 0, max = 1, value = 0.1, step = 0.01),
    actionButton("calculate", "Calculate"),
    textOutput("tc_hat_soc"),
    textOutput("tc_hat_trt")
  )
  # Show a plot of the generated distribution
)

# Define server logic required to draw a histogram
server <- function(input, output) {
  #inputvalue <- renderText(input$input_c_trt)
  observeEvent(input$calculate, {
    req(input$input_c_trt)
    source("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clazinusveijer/shinylive_BIA/refs/heads/main/run_simulation.R")
    BIA <- run_simulation_st(c_trt = input$input_c_trt)
    #tc_hat_soc <- round(BIA$outcomes_SoC$tc_hat, 2)
    #tc_hat_trt <- round(BIA$outcomes_trt$tc_hat, 2)
    output$tc_hat_soc <- renderText({ paste("Per patient costs SoC:", round(BIA$outcomes_SoC$tc_hat, 2)) })
    output$tc_hat_trt <- renderText({ paste("Per patient costs FX06:", round(BIA$outcomes_trt$tc_hat, 2)) })
  })
}
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
